snippet.title: Lionheart English Opening
snippet.description:
Opening movie for Japanese RPG Lionheart.
Coming to Steam soon in English!

Developed by Shiisanmei, localized by Fruitbat Factory.

http://shiisanmei.web.fc2.com/
http://fruitbatfactory.com/
http://store.steampowered.com/app/494160
